resources.string: This screen show information about the track playing. To extract meta-data from the file, the class MediaMetaDataRetriever can be used.

This screen shows a list of the albums in the music library using a ListView and the user can click on it to get a list of the songs of that album. The class MediaStore can be used for this task and more specifically MediaStore.Audio.Albums.

This screen shows a list of the artists in the music library using a ListView and the user can click on it to get a list of the songs of that artist. The class MediaStore can be used for this task and more specifically MediaStore.Audio.Artists.

This screen shows a list of the playlists in the music library using a ListView and the user can click on it to get a list of the songs of that playlist. The class MediaStore can be used for this task and more specifically MediaStore.Audio.Playlists.
The search uses MediaStore class to search the music library. Search music library:
